propsData.name: allowMultipleOpen
propsData.description: If prop is included then multiple accordion tabs can be opened at once

propsData.name: children
propsData.description: The children are html divs that create the content sections. Child divs can accept props - id, title, data-btnChild, link-datatype, children. The only props needed to make a working accordion are title and children

propsData.name: icon
propsData.description: Usually Carat but you can pass in any icon that is in the Icon obj

propsData.name: btnClass
propsData.description: Add a custom class to the button of the accordion

propsData.name: btnChildStyle
propsData.description: Add a custom class to any children passed to the accordion button

propsData.name: contentClass
propsData.description: Add a custom class to the content
